LanguageData.ARA_Basic_Start_Scenario.label: A New Arachne Hive
LanguageData.ARA_Basic_Start_Scenario.description: An Arachne Hive Queen has descended upon a desolate Rimworld, ready to begin the construction of her own hive.
LanguageData.ARA_Basic_Start_Scenario.scenario.name: A New Arachne Hive
LanguageData.ARA_Basic_Start_Scenario.scenario.descri: An Arachne Hive Queen has descended upon a desolate Rimworld, ready to begin the construction of her own hive.
LanguageData.ARA_Basic_Start_Scenario.scenario.summar: Start the game with 1 Arachne Hive Queen as your initial colonist. You begin with 4 Arachne Egg Sacs.
The Hive Queen has arrived at the designated area.
Planet Environment Scan: Habitable.
Biomass Resources: Abundant.
Local Native Civilization: Threat Level - Low.
Neural Weave Reconstruction Complete. Welcome to 'Us'.

Initial Directives:
Ensure the survival of the Hive Queen. She is the root of the hive.
Hatch the Arachne Eggs and increase the insectoid population in this area.
Assimilate the local biomass and accumulate resources to ensure the survival of the swarm.
Reconstruct the genetic tree and make 'Us' whole again.

For the survival of the Hive.
